data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: Eating breakfast is one of the mundane tasks that we must perform in life. Breakfast is the first meal of the day and it is very important to inject energy and essence to support the whole day. I would always eat a lot of groceries containing different nutrients for breakfast, for example, blueberries cereal bowls, avocado spreads on bread, crumble eggs, and milk.
data.referenceText: Describe some of the mundane tasks that we must perform in life.
data.referenceTranslate: 描述一些我们生活中必须完成的平凡任务。
